reviews.review_msg: Unclear grading criteria. No response or significantly-delayed response to emails.
Caring prof that is always accessible for extra help and goes out of his way to be helpful.

It was a complete privilege to listen and learn from him. He is brilliant and well- rounded. Very engaging, clear and considers his students. He is humble yet profound in his thinking. Excellent speaker and very intelligent. He always made me "think" and question everything. Maybe I questioned too much but it is this reason why I want to learn more

Eugene is the best professor/teacher I have ever had. Very clear and makes the subject extremely interesting. To get a good grade you do have to work hard, but you'll take great satisfaction from achieving in this class. And the material you learn will stick with you for a long time and make you highly knowledgeable on the subject of Global Cities
